body_html: This is usually because some process are still alive. You can find them by doing lsof /dev/nvidia0 and finding if any python process is listed there that should not be here. Then you can kill that process.
body_text: This is usually because some process are still alive. You can find them by doing lsof /dev/nvidia0 and finding if any python process is listed there that should not be here. Then you can kill that process.
body: This is usually because some process are still alive. You can find them by doing `lsof /dev/nvidia0` and finding if any python process is listed there that should not be here. Then you can kill that process.
